title: Puzzle Slider

desc: A simple Tic Tac Toe game created using vanilla Javascript

title: Weather App
desc: An app that allows a user to enter a 5 digit zip code and using an API, pull in real time weather data for that location.

desc: A simple calculator created with Javascript

title: React Restaurant
desc: A fictional restaurant site created in React.  This was an exercise in pulling data from an API and setting local storage.

title: Sloper
desc: My Final Project for the Awesome Inc Bootcamp. This app uses Laravel and React to create an indoor climbing route management system.  Register and play around, or sign in as admin@admin.com with password admin to change the routes.
